verses.verse: Ho, <WH1945> every <WH3605> one that thirsts, <WH6771> come <WH3212> you to the waters, <WH4325> and he that has no <WH369> money; <WH3701> come <WH3212> you, buy, <WH7666> and eat; <WH398> yes, come, <WH3212> buy <WH7666> wine <WH3196> and milk <WH2461> without <WH3808> money <WH3701> and without <WH3808> price. <WH4242>

Why <WH4100> do you spend <WH8254> money <WH3701> for that which is not bread? <WH3899> and your labor <WH3018> for that which satisfies <WH7654> not? listen <WH8085> diligently to me, and eat <WH398> you that which is good, <WH2896> and let your soul <WH5315> delight <WH6026> itself in fatness. <WH1880>

Incline <WH5186> your ear, <WH241> and come <WH3212> to me: hear, <WH8085> and your soul <WH5315> shall live; <WH2421> and I will make <WH3772> an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> with you, even the sure <WH539> mercies <WH2617> of David. <WH1732>
Behold, <WH2005> I have given <WH5414> him for a witness <WH5707> to the people, <WH3816> a leader <WH5057> and commander <WH6680> to the people. <WH3816>

Behold, <WH2005> you shall call <WH7121> a nation <WH1471> that you know <WH3045> not, and nations <WH1471> that knew <WH3045> not you shall run <WH7323> to you because <WH4616> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and for the Holy <WH6918> One of Israel; <WH3478> for he has glorified <WH6286> you.
Seek <WH1875> you the LORD <WH3068> while he may be found, <WH4672> call <WH7121> you on him while he is near: <WH7138>

Let the wicked <WH7563> forsake <WH5800> his way, <WH1870> and the unrighteous <WH205> man <WH376> his thoughts: <WH4284> and let him return <WH7725> to the LORD, <WH3068> and he will have mercy <WH7355> on him; and to our God, <WH430> for he will abundantly <WH7235> pardon. <WH5545>
For my thoughts <WH4284> are not your thoughts, <WH4284> neither <WH3808> are your ways <WH1870> my ways, <WH1870> said <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>
For as the heavens <WH8064> are higher <WH1361> than the earth, <WH776> so <WH3651> are my ways <WH1870> higher <WH1361> than your ways, <WH1870> and my thoughts <WH4284> than your thoughts. <WH4284>

For as the rain <WH1653> comes <WH3381> down, <WH3381> and the snow <WH7950> from heaven, <WH8064> and returns <WH7725> not thither, <WH8033> but waters <WH7301> the earth, <WH776> and makes it bring <WH3205> forth <WH3205> and bud, <WH6779> that it may give <WH5414> seed <WH2233> to the sower, <WH2232> and bread <WH3899> to the eater: <WH398>

So <WH3651> shall my word <WH1697> be that goes <WH3318> forth <WH3318> out of my mouth: <WH6310> it shall not return <WH7725> to me void, <WH7387> but it shall accomplish <WH6213> that which <WH834> I please, <WH2654> and it shall prosper <WH6743> in the thing whereto <WH834> I sent <WH7971> it.

For you shall go <WH3318> out with joy, <WH8057> and be led <WH2986> forth <WH2986> with peace: <WH7965> the mountains <WH2022> and the hills <WH1389> shall break <WH6476> forth before <WH6440> you into singing, <WH7440> and all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> shall clap <WH4222> their hands. <WH3709>

Instead <WH8478> of the thorn <WH5285> shall come <WH5927> up the fir <WH1265> tree, and instead <WH8478> of the brier <WH5636> shall come <WH5927> up the myrtle <WH1918> tree: and it shall be to the LORD <WH3068> for a name, <WH8034> for an everlasting <WH5769> sign <WH226> that shall not be cut <WH3772> off.
